title: Kitch and Good - Eat's Good
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Fast food, Delivery, Take-out, French, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Kitch & Good is the new name starting 2014. Choose your starter from the refrigerator case, choose a hot meal, then a dessert. Food is mostly vegetarian except for tuna fish. Family friendly atmosphere with international flavors. For each menu one buys, the company will supply a sandwich for someone in need.
